org.openadaptor.core.lifecycle
Class LifecycleDelegate

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.lifecycle.LifecycleDelegate
public class LifecycleDelegate
extends java.lang.Object

Thread safe class that can be used by classes wishing to implement the ILifecycleComponent interface.

Author:
perryj
